1.「リウ老師……。| そなたは いったい どこにいるのじゃ……。: Master Liu... I don't know where the hell you|are.

2.「う～む……。そうやって ぼんやりしながら| 一日中 何もしねえ アンタは| 史: Hmmm... You're the most useless person ever,|sitting around all day doing nothing!

3.「よしッ！ 決定ッ！| アンタ ポツコン３号ッ！: Yes! It's decided! You are POTUSCON 3!

4.「ポツコン３号？ よく わからぬが……| おぬし 今 余を 役立たずと申したな！: POTUSCON 3? I don't know, but... Did you just|call me useless? Rude! In a world like ours,|you'd be beheaded.

5.「このような時代に 来ることがなければ| 余は 今ごろ たいそうな技術を| リウ: If I hadn't come to this time, Master Liu|would have taught me a great many skills by|now!

6.「そうじゃ！ リウ老師は 言っておった！| 余が 成人した あかつきには| とっ: That's right! Master Liu said! When I come of|age, he's going to teach me some of his most|valuable skills!

7.「あのときの約束さえ 果たされていたら……: If only that promise had been fulfilled

9.「よかった！ <pc> ここに いたのね。| あなたが ガラクタ城にいるって|: Thank God!<pc> There you are... The townspeople told me you|were in the junk castle, so I rushed over|there!

10.「カルサドラ火山で 大変なことが起きてるの！: There's something terrible happening at|Calzadora Volcano!

11.「火山を調査している 学者さんの話によると| 魔物の大群が 火山に押し寄せて|: According to the scholars who study|volcanoes, hordes of demons are coming to the|volcano and doing ritualistic things!

13.「え……。な…なに この子……？| お父さん また 子供を拾ってきたの？: Uh... What the... What's this kid...? Dad,|did you pick up another child?

14.「今の話は 本当よ。| 私も 遠巻きにだけど 鳥っぽい魔物が| 火口付近に集まっ: What I'm talking about now... I, too, saw a|bird-like creature gathering near the crater|from afar.

15.「<pc>よ 聞いたかえ！？| グルヤンラシュじゃ！| ついに きゃつが 動きだ: <pc> Did you hear what I said? It's Gurjarash!|It's Gurjarash! He's on the move!

17.「くわしく 説明している時間はない！| カルサドラ火山こそ きゃつの新たな根城じ: There's no time to go into detail! Calzadora|Volcano is Kyatsu's new stronghold! It's|obvious they're staging a plot there!

18.「あなたの言っていることは| よく わからないけど……。| 不吉な予感がするのは: I don't know what you're talking about,|but... I have a bad feeling about this...

19.「だから すぐにでも 火口付近に行って| あやしい儀式を 止めたいんだけど……。: So I'd like to get over to the crater right|now and stop this weird ritual, but... Unless|you can fly, you can't go there.

20.「ねえ！ <pc> お願い！| カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行く方法を| 私と: Hey!<pc> Please! I need you to find a way to get to|the crater of Calzadora Volcano with me.<yesno><close>

21.「そう言わずに お願いよ！| 私 ひとりでは 間に合わないかもしれないわ！| す: Don't say that. Please! I might not be able|to make it alone! There's already quite a few|of them here!

22.「ありがとう <pc>！| 外から 火口付近に行くのは ムリみたいだから| 火山:
Thank you I'm sorry. It looks like there's no way to|get to the crater from the outside, so let's|see if we can't get there from inside the|
|volcano!

23.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを 進むことになるけど| ほかに方法が 思いつかないわ！|: We'll have to go through a lava flow cave,|but I don't see any other way! Well, I guess|I'll just be on my way!

25.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを行くなど みすみす| 死ににいくようなものじゃ。そなたのよ: To walk through a lava-flowing cave is like|dying without knowing it... Why would a|maiden of your stature take such a risk?

26.「私たちの世界が 危険にさらされてるのよ？| 私たちの手で なんとかするのが当然: Our world is in danger, okay? It's in our|hands to do something about it.

28.「……そうか。| じゃがな どれだけ そなたが がんばっても| カルサドラ火山の: ...... But no matter how hard you try, you'll|never reach the crater of Calzadora!

29.「カルサドラ火山の火口……。| そこは かつて ガテリア皇国の民が| 儀式に使っ: The crater of Calzadora Volcano... It was|once a sacred place used by the people of the|Empire of Gateria for rituals...

30.「そのため 他国の者が 火口に立ち入らぬよう| 徒歩で行ける道は すべて封じたの: That's why we've blocked off all roads|accessible on foot, so that no one from other|countries can enter the crater...

31.「なんですって！？| そんなことをしたら その儀式にだって| みんな 行けないじ: What? If we do that, we can't even go to the|ceremony!

32.「ふっふっふ。心配には及ばぬ。| なぜならば……: Hmm... I'm not worried about... Because...

33.「ガテリアの民は 道を封じる前に| 火口への転送装置を 作っておいたからな！: Because the people of Gateria built a|transporter to the crater before they blocked|the way!

34.「火口への転送装置？| そんなモノが……。: A transporter to the crater? Something like|that...

35.「転送装置は 技術的には高度なものだが| 作り自体は単純なものである！ あれなら: The transporter is technically advanced, but|it's simple to build! It should be able to|operate in this day and age!

36.「よしッ！ それでは <pc>よ！| 転送装置を動かす 起動器具……| 三闘士の: All right! All right, then.<pc> No! The activation device that powers the|transporter... Take the machete of the|triumvirate and go!

38.「……コホン。<pc>よ。もったいぶらずに| 持ってくるのじゃ。三闘士のオノくら: ......<pc> I'll bring it. Don't be shy. I'll bring it...|The machetes of the three warriors are as|common as they come in this age, aren't they?<yesno><close>

39.「なに言ってんですッ！ 元ポツコン２号ッ！| そんな名前のもん うちには ねえで: What are you talking about? Ex-POTUS 2! We|don't have a name like that! I've never seen|or heard of it!

40.「な なんじゃとッ！？| 三闘士のオノすら この時代には| ないと申すかッ！！: What the hell? Not even the machetes of the|three warriors are available in this age!

41.「なんということじゃ……。| たったひとつの道が 断たれてしもうた……。| もう: What a mess... Only one path has been cut|off... It's over...

43.「なに あきらめてるのよ！？| ないなら 作ればいいじゃない！: Why are you giving up? If you don't have it,|why don't you make it?

44.「さ 三闘士のオノを作るじゃと？| 単純な作りのものゆえ 作れるかもしれぬが|:
You want me to make you a sannou no machete?|It's simple enough that you might be able to|make one, but I've never heard of making one|
|yourself...

45.「できるかもしれないことは| あきらめずに やってみるのよ。| 道を 切りひらく: Don't give up on what you might be able to|do. It's the only way to create a path...

47.「さあ そのオノのこと くわしく教えて。| 今 頼れるのは それを知ってる| あ: Now, tell me more about that axe... You're|the only one who knows about it now...
